header_text: A friend suggests that you join a creative writing organization. He tells you that members of the organization will read and critique your writing. As you listen to your friend, the thought of other people looking at your writing makes you feel enthusiastic.

elements.Text: Do you expect to feel uncomfortable if others look at your work?
